    • Method Detail

      • getRandomValue

        public static int getRandomValue(int n)
        Returns a random value in the range [0..n-1].
        Parameters:
        n - the number of possible outcomes
        Returns:
        a uniformly distributed pseudorandom in the range [0..n-1]

      • getRandomTime

        public static double getRandomTime(double averageTime)
        Returns a time with exponential distribution.
        Parameters:
        averageTime - the parameter of the exponential distribution
        Returns:
        a pseudorandom with exponential distribution

      • getRandomEvent

        public static boolean getRandomEvent(double probability)
        Flips a coin with a given probability.
        Parameters:
        probability - the probability of success
        Returns:
        a pseudorandom boolean with Bernoulli distribution
